### My Data Science Profile
```{r}
labels = c("Data Viz","ML","Math","Stats","CS", "Comms","Domain")
myscores = c(1.5,2.5,1,2,1.5,2,0)
myprofile = data.frame(Category=labels, Score=myscores)
barplot(myprofile$Score, names.arg=myprofile$Category, col='blue', 
        ylab="Score", main="Garrity DS Profile", ylim=c(0,5))
```

### Chi-square population
```{r}
population = rchisq(10000000, df=2)
hist(population, main="Chi-Square Population")
```
```{r}
mean(population)
sd(population)
```
